fullText:
Inciting Spirit

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite: Razorclaw shifter, razorclaw shifting racial power, shaman, call spirit companion power
Benefit: When you use razorclaw shifting, until the end of the encounter any ally that starts its turn in a square adjacent to your spirit companion gains a +1 power bonus to speed until the start of the ally’s next turn.

Published in Dragon Magazine 387, page(s) 13.
